summary: This is an email from September 12, 2007, regarding a meeting about a proposed resolution in the Epstein case. The email mentions several attorneys and a meeting with Barry Kirscher.

events.title: Meeting on Epstein Proposed Resolution
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for 1:30 PM involving Alex Acosta, Gerald Lefcourt, Jack Goldberger, and Barry Kirscher to discuss the proposed resolution in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The email is dated September 12, 2007, and discusses a meeting regarding a 'proposed resolution' in the Epstein case.
U.S. Attorney Alex Acosta is directly involved in communications about the proposed resolution.
The meeting involves multiple attorneys: Gerald Lefcourt, Jack Goldberger, and Barry Kirscher.
The document indicates ongoing legal negotiations or discussions concerning the resolution of the Epstein case at that time.
